Text: No plot summary, not even a poster on IMDB.  If there's missing information on IMDB then I generally find it to be a poor quality film.  If the studio didn't take the time and effort to publish the information on IMDB then how much time and effort did they put into the making of the film?  My guess is its a strait to Syfy thriller flick but if you like that kind of thing, go for it.
